<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Added AND_OR_ENHANCED to glide.ais.query.search_operator, which uses OR when there's more than 2 key words in the search query. This will be set to the default search query mode for new customers.</description>
        <name>add new value for search operator </name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// add new search query mode for everyone
var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
gr.addQuery("name","glide.ais.query.search_operator");
gr.query();
if(gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue("choices","AND then OR 2+ key terms=AND_OR_ENHANCED, AND then OR query=AND_OR, OR query=OR");
    gr.update();
    gs.log('new search query mode added');
}

// if new customer instance, update default value to new search query mode
if (pm.isZboot()) {
    gr.setValue("value","AND_OR_ENHANCED");
    gr.update();
    gs.log('modified default search query mode');
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>

</record_update>
